channel.title: vps on ZhouYang's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in vps on ZhouYang's Blog

item.title: VPS搭建步骤
item.description: VPS搭建步骤 # 切换到root用户 sudo -i # 使用脚本安装v2ray bash <(curl -s -L https://git.io/v2ray.sh) # 按照提示配置v2ray # 关闭系统防火墙 systemctl stop firewalld # 查看防火墙状态 systemctl status firewalld
